doctor.name: Prof. Dr. M. Safiul Alam
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. M. Safiul Alam is a Cancer Specialist in Mymensingh. His qualification is MBBS, DMRT (DU). He is a Former Professor & Head, Radiotherapy at Mymensingh Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Sayem Diagno Complex & Hospital, Mymensingh. Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. M. Safiul Alam at Sayem Diagno Complex & Hospital, Mymensingh is 4pm to 8pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.name: Prof. Dr. Md. Aminul Islam
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Md. Aminul Islam is a Oncologist in Mymensingh. His qualification is MBBS, DMRT (DU), FACP (USA). He is a Professor & Head, Radiotherapy at Mymensingh Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Mymensingh. Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. Md. Aminul Islam at Popular Diagnostic Center, Mymensingh is 3pm to 9pm (Sat, Sun, Tue & Wed).

doctor.name: Dr. Md. Saiful Islam Pathan
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Saiful Islam Pathan is a Cancer Specialist in Mymensingh. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MD (Radiation Oncology). He is a Resident Physician, Radiotherapy at Mymensingh Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Sodesh Hospital, Mymensingh. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Saiful Islam Pathan at Sodesh Hospital, Mymensingh is 4pm to 7pm (Sun, Mon, Tue & Wed).

doctor.name: Dr. Ahmed Jabeer
doctor.info: Dr. Ahmed Jabeer is a Oncologist in Mymensingh. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MD (Medical Oncology). He is a Consultant (Medical Oncology ) at Delta Health Care Mymensingh Ltd. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Delta Health Care, Mymensingh. Practicing hour of Dr. Ahmed Jabeer at Delta Health Care, Mymensingh is 3pm to 9pm (Closed: Friday).
